title: One Direction's Liam Payne splits from Girlfriend
text: One Direction's Liam Payne splits from Girlfriend Monday, 26 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) One Direction â€™s Liam Payne has split from girlfriend of two years Sophia Smith, it has been reported. Why Did Liam Payne Cause 1D to Call Off Their Belfast Concert? 00:42 Quick clarification: No, the world is not coming to an end, but a One Direction concert has been canceled. The boyband includes Liam Payne , Harry Styles , Niall Horan and Louis Tomlinson. The wildly popular group called off their show in Belfast today moments before the young heartthrobs were...
